Tue, 02 Jul 2024 05:24:34 +0000 Jeannine Ball and her mother-in-law Lynda Ball pictured either side of Kim Blakeney-Williams who took their lives in a crash in Taupō on January 5 this year. Blakeney-Williams was today sentenced on two charges of careless driving causing death. Photo / NZME
